aoop.asteroids.model

Class SmallAsteroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • aoop.asteroids.model.GameObject
      • aoop.asteroids.model.Asteroid
        • aoop.asteroids.model.SmallAsteroid

  • public class SmallAsteroid
extends Asteroid
    This class is a factory class for a regular asteroid. It forwards all given parameters to the Asteroid class and sets its radius to 10 pixels.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class aoop.asteroids.model.GameObject

        destroyed, locationX, locationY, radius, stepsTilCollide, velocityX, velocityY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmallAsteroid(java.awt.Point location, double velocityX, double velocityY)
      Constructs a new small asteroid.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class aoop.asteroids.model.GameObject

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmallAsteroid

        public SmallAsteroid(java.awt.Point location,
                     double velocityX,
                     double velocityY)
        Constructs a new small asteroid. I.e. the radius will be 10 pixels.
        Parameters:
        location - location of the asteroid.
        velocityX - velocity in X direction.
        velocityY - velocity in Y direction.
